critter.name: Puffer Fish
critter.desc: As expected, all puffer fish are covered in spines. While related to the blowfish, they are not poisonous. Exaggerated claims about the fish say they have 1,000 spines; the true number is between 300 and 400. When threatened, they suck in water and air to puff themselves up in order to intimidate enemies.
critter.quote: I caught a puffer fish! I thought you would be tougher, fish!
